trans-unit.source: Provides functions to render a collection of categorized tools, as well as notify users about tool selection and creation events.
This class is `sealed`, so it cannot be inherited.
This class provides support for representing the toolbox controls when re-hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] outside of Visual Studio.
It implements <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl> contains a collection of toolbox categories that hold various categories of tools that can be accessed with the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.Categories%2A> property.

It also is able to retrieve the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> with which it is associated using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property.
For activities to load properly in the toolbox, the assembly that contains the activities must be loaded first.

Use <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A> to load the activity type if it is contained in a different assembly; using <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> instead will cause an exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] with which this toolbox control is associated.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.WorkflowDesigner"></xref> instance with which this toolbox control is associated.
Gets or sets the collection of toolbox categories associated with this control.
If the value set is `null`, the categories in the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> will be cleared.

The <xref href="System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> that contains the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> objects associated with this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl"></xref>.
Gets or sets the style used for each category item.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> object that contains the style applied to each of the categories.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.CategoryItemStyle"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the data template used for the category.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> for the category.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.CategoryTemplate"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Builds the visual tree for this toolbox control.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.OnApplyTemplate%2A> method is invoked by the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl> implements <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>, which, in turn, implements <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
Gets or sets the tool being selected in the toolbox.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> object selected.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.SelectedTool"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the name of the toolbox file.
The name of the toolbox file.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolboxFile"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Occurs when a tool is created in the toolbox control.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolCreated"></xref> event.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the style used for the tool items.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the tool items.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolItemStyle"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Occurs when a tool is selected in the toolbox control.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolSelected"></xref> event.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the data template used for the tools.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the tools.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolTemplate"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
